#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
inline long long int get() {
	char c;
	long long int n = 0;
 
	while ((c = getchar_unlocked()) < 48)
		;
	n += (c - 48);
 
	while ((c = getchar_unlocked()) >= 48)
		n = n * 10 + (c - 48);
 
	return n;
}

void print(long long int n)
{
	char op[41];
	int size = 40;
	while(n)
	{
		op[size--] = n%10+'0';
		n/=10;
	}
	for(int i=size+1;i<41;i++)
	putchar(op[i]);
	putchar('\n');
}


int main() {
	long long int t,n,m,k;
t=get();
while(t--)
{
n=get();
k=get();
m=get();
if(k==1)
{
print(n);
continue;
}
while((n%k==0)&&m)
{m--;
n=n/k;
}
if(m&1)
print(n*k);
else
print(n);
}
// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
